title: Brilliant app but ONE issue
comment: The one issue is that the app automatically saves a file when you press the back button on your phone/device. Unlike other apps it doesn't give you the option to save/discard changes, or go back to the app (incase you accidently pressed the back button). This means that if you accidently delete a load of text it will save as is and there is no way to discard the changes you made. Please please please add this feature because too many times have I accidently deleted text or pressed the back button.

title: I'd give it a 5 except for...
comment: I'd give this a solid 5 with how easy it is to use and how it does overall work well except... When I just installed it on my phone and tried to use the browse feature to find a text file that I had deposited on my SD card, I could only see the blue folders in the browser, the text was black on a black background.  I went into the options panel and noticed that it was showing white text on a black background, however that's not what was showing on the screen in the browser.  When I switched it around to black text on white background it worked perfectly fine, but switching it back to white text on black background again leaves it displaying black text on a black background on my phone.  So, only a 4 right now.
